Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that implements a RocketMQ producer capable of sending messages to a specified topic with a given tag. The class should handle producer initialization, message sending, and resource cleanup.

Class Description: The Producer class encapsulates the functionality of a RocketMQ message producer. It manages the producer lifecycle (startup and shutdown) and provides a method to send messages to a RocketMQ broker.

Attributes:
- producer: DefaultMQProducer - The underlying RocketMQ producer instance that handles message sending operations

Methods:
- Constructor: Producer(String producerGroup, String namesrvAddr) -> void - Initializes a new producer instance with the specified producer group and NameServer address
- start: start() -> void - Starts the producer instance to begin sending messages
- sendMessage: sendMessage(String topic, String tag, String messageBody) -> SendResult - Creates and sends a message to the specified topic with the given tag and body
- shutdown: shutdown() -> void - Shuts down the producer instance and releases resources
